name: Zeta Flyff
description:
FlyFF, Fly For Fun ( in Spanish: «fly for fun» ), is a massively multiplayer 3D online video game.

FlyFF stands out from most of the other massively multiplayer online video games as it has a flight system, in which players can fly using a board, flying broom, motorcycles, wings or other items as a means of transportation throughout the virtual world of it.

It also offers PvP (Player vs. Player, player vs. player), parties (groups), guilds (clans) and many quests (searches) and currently the maximum level is 150 (since update v17). The game is F2P (free to play) and will be free forever, but you can use money to buy special items, such as costumes, scrolls and items.

The game also uses the GameGuard as an anti-cheat system, which is a rootkit.

  From the fourteenth version DirectX SDK is needed to play.
